website_summaries.verdict: Combination of six oils gives hair a hydrating boost.
pros: Immediate, noticeable results on brittle hair
Prevents breakage and does a great job fighting frizz in humid conditions
Available in shampoo and conditioner sets
cons: Tends to weigh down fine hair

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: After taking the "on line" Bumble & Bumble quiz to determine products to help my natural, but dry hair, this was purchased as a gift. It was awful! Each use has made it worse till it looks like a haystack or over processed bleached hair, which it is not!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Green

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I really really really wanted to like this shampoo and conditioner. At this price point, I expected a lot. I have super thick hair that I need to use high heat to tame/style. I was hoping this shampoo/conditioner would help my hair feel silky and smooth. Unfortunately, after a shower with these products, my hair felt even more corse. Even worse, my hair was more prone to snarls and brushing was a nightmare. The finished look wasn’t anything I wouldn’t get from using my old shampoo/conditioner. Given all that, I can’t recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Fake! Not a real bumble and bumble product.
customer_reviews.text: It is so different from the real bumble and bumble product. So disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Communication

customer_reviews.title: I recommend bumble and bumble to everyone
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through many different shampoos and conditioners over my lifetime and when my cousin went through hair school I told her how my hair felt that it was really dry and she recommended this shampoo and conditioner and then when I get out of the shower I use the same product only The leave in conditioning spray and I put about five squirts of the D freezing oil and my hair is so silky and shiny and soft it’s not damaged anymore
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn McHenry

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff. I use Davies alot as well and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff. I use Davies alot as well and find I actually like this a bit better. I have dry curly hair and it really adds a soft touch and my hair really does better all the way around with this combination. I think it is the oil which is perfectly part of this formula.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Quality same as $5 drugstore brands.
customer_reviews.text: I have natural Asian long black hair. I live in Arizona, so dryness is a constant issue. This product isn’t the worst, but definitely not great. Shampoo leaves hair stiff and coarse. Lathers well, but gets too creamy and doesn’t reach to scalp very well. Conditioner is better, but you must leave it for a long time to get better results. Scent could be improved; a little too sweet to feel refreshed. Definitely recommend Shiseido Tsubaki shampoo/conditioner over these. After blow drying, hair wasn’t the smoothest so I adjusted with Kerastase leave in hair oil for moisture control. Overall: small portion, overpriced, not worth the try.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: B&B products are great for my hair!
customer_reviews.text: I have used B&B products for ten years - they may be a little costly but they last for a very long time - I have my hair colored every 6 weeks and my hair has been great all these years.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret W.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for dry hair
customer_reviews.text: This product has absolutely Changed my hair for the better! If you have dry hair, this will transform it! I also purchased the spray but after a week... I don't even need it for styling!
customer_reviews.author: gillian Crane

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but works
customer_reviews.text: Given as a gift to someone looking to make her dry hair moist and not frizzy. She said it was the best but too expensive for her to buy. Great as a gift, too pricey for everyday people and everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: smilelady

customer_reviews.title: Save your money not worth the price for frizzy hair
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it was listed as top 10 for the best smoothing shampoo for wavy or frizzy hair, I'm very disappointed my hair is smoother with my supermarket . shampoo
customer_reviews.author: JEN

customer_reviews.title: Nice product!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter in laws favorite hair product, so I keep it on hand for their visits!
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Makes my hair full and healthy and shiny.
customer_reviews.text: A lot of shampoos make my head itchy. This product makes my hair look healthy, full, and shiny. thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Polly Letofsky

customer_reviews.title: Good for Brazilian blowouts.
customer_reviews.text: I have a brazialian blowout and these products work well with it and keeps the blow out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft Hair
customer_reviews.text: Made my hair soft, slik and smooth. Doesn't feel oily. But I do feel like I am losing more hair since I started using it.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have blonde processed hair and this shampoo works amazing!!! Love, love, love!!!
customer_reviews.author: Juana Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Not with the money
customer_reviews.text: This product is not worth the money. It made my hair dry and brittle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bumble and Bumble hair products keep your hair shiny and smooth!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Bumble and Bumble for many years. When my salon stopped selling it, I was so happy to see that I could order it from Amazon! These products make my hair smooth and silky!
customer_reviews.author: Candace H Bold

customer_reviews.title: Dried out Hair!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because it stated it would help with dry hair. After 1 week of use, it made my hair worse than before using it. Very disappointing. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Monica M Sexton

customer_reviews.title: Best product for my fine lifeless hair
customer_reviews.text: The best product for my fine hair. Gives me a great feel. Hair feels the best in a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Momma Smitty

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but pricey
customer_reviews.text: Seventy some dollars for shampoo and conditioner is a bit pricey, but I color my hair and this product is the best I've found to avoid dry, damaged hair.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Mispackaged product leaked all over packaging
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I have no issue with the product, it's fantastic. HOWEVER, whoever packaged it did not secure the top of the shampoo bottle and half of the contents exploded all over the package. :(
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Love this duo
customer_reviews.text: Love this duo! I have very thick wavy hair. This is great whether I let it go 'natural', or use a flat iron. It leaves my hair soft without weighing it down. You'll love how healthy your hair looks and feels!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: it's been really hard for me to find a good shampoo and conditioner that doesn't make my hair feel ...
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, it's been really hard for me to find a good shampoo and conditioner that doesn't make my hair feel weighed down. Usually I have crazy frizz but this has helped with that so much! Love it
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Smells delicious
customer_reviews.text: Perfect condition and best product out therefor keratin treated hair 😊👍
customer_reviews.author: ggonzo

customer_reviews.title: Works well!!
customer_reviews.text: I have course hair and it makes my hair soft and not frizzy.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Shur

customer_reviews.title: Soft, silky hair - even though I’m in the pool all the time.
customer_reviews.text: Best hair product ever. I’m in the pool all the time and have colored hair. This B and B line protects and keeps my hair in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: Mactoon

customer_reviews.title: ... the right amount of stripping for me to feel like my hair is really healthy and soft without being ...
customer_reviews.text: I have really thick hair and live in Texas so this set does just the right amount of stripping for me to feel like my hair is really healthy and soft without being too oily.
customer_reviews.author: Madielikealion

customer_reviews.title: hmm...fake or watered down!
customer_reviews.text: Shampoo is most definitely watered down compared to the real Bumble and Bumble! Same smell, isn’t as strong.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite shampoo and conditioner
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite shampoo and conditioner. It smells amazing and keeps your hair looking and feeling great. Shipping was incredibly fast!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love love love the smell and the feel! Definitely will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: -M

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this shampoo and conditioner, great for my hair but hard on my pocket $$
customer_reviews.author: danna clark

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Great shampoo and conditioner. Works great and smells great. Keeps my hair tangle free
customer_reviews.author: Jill F.

customer_reviews.title: quality product.
customer_reviews.text: love the way it makes my hair feel and look! great product.
customer_reviews.author: psyoga

customer_reviews.title: smooth and retains styling much better. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: My hair is soft, smooth and retains styling much better. Highly recommend, color safe
customer_reviews.author: SVJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My favorite shampoo and great price Will most definitely will be reordering
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You expect your hair to be silky and tame - ...
customer_reviews.text: You expect your hair to be silky and tame - however it left my hair corse. Will not buy again
customer_reviews.author: emongw

customer_reviews.title: These products are amazing!
customer_reviews.text: My hair doesn't get frizzy even in summer humidity. These products are amazing!
customer_reviews.author: L. Gluck

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite shampoo and conditioner combination
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite shampoo and conditioner combination. I often use the conditioner as leave in. It's perfect. My hair is thick and curly/wavy and this shampoo and conditioner is not too heavy nor too oily. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Oops

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It's okay. Disappointed because of the price. I splurged, thinking this would work wonders. It doesn't. Also disappointed in the smell. Not good at all.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Originally loved this but after several uses I won't be repurchasing
customer_reviews.text: I originally tried this as a sample from BirchBox and LOVED it. However, after several uses I found that this shampoo and conditioner only work well for me if I blowdry my hair after washing it. Otherwise my hair is a greasy, stringy mess. On another note I have used the conditioner with a different shampoo (Alfaparf Semi Di Lino shampoo or Davines Love shampoo) and my hair air dried nicely and didn't look greasy. I probably won't repurchase this product again. I will probably go with the Davines Love shampoo and conditioner since I can let my hair air dry without worrying about it looking greasy. I also found that these products have been breaking my back out too.
customer_reviews.author: B Rose

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite. Keeps my thick
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite. Keeps my thick, coarse, wavy hair feeling soft and looking shiny. I've had color that has roughed up my hair but this is making my hair feel amazing. I don't feel greasy or dirty too quickly either. Also the scent is light and pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Good for dry hair without being oily
customer_reviews.text: I got a free sample size with an order from Nordstrom and I liked it so much I ordered regular size shampoo and conditioner. Shampoo leaves hair squeaky clean without stripping hair of oil. Conditioner is nice and thick but easy to apply and seems to work well. I've just had it about a month, but so far I'm loving it. I had been using Redken sulfate free shampoo previously.
customer_reviews.author: Nonny

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way!
customer_reviews.text: I used to use cheap shampoo and conditioner, but I had to use a lot and it still didn't work very well. When I started using BB, I was impressed with how little I had to use to get the job done properly. In fact, I was emberrased that I had unknowingly been walking around with my hair greasier than it should have been. Sure, I pay quite a bit more ounce for ounce, but the difference in cost is diminished by the effectiveness of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Sycamore

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Pros: shampoo and conditioner do a superb job of cleaning and conditioning my dry hair. Con: pricey but good value
customer_reviews.author: SillyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Holy Grail
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Provides my hair with a lot of moisture. Love the soft scent.
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Bad container
customer_reviews.text: Conditioner tube doesn’t release all product. Very expensive for amount of useable product.
customer_reviews.author: ireadalot

customer_reviews.title: My new fave!
customer_reviews.text: I am Obsessed. This smells amazing and my hair is so soft. You don't need a lot at all and it is sulphate free, so it is safer to use. Love!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, shiny, without a flat iron
customer_reviews.text: In my arsenal of shower hair care. When I'm wanting beautiful, sleek, shiny (no need to use my straightener my blow out will suffice kind of hair...)look, B&B is my "go to"
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan S.

customer_reviews.title: i like bumble and bumble
customer_reviews.text: i like bumble and bumble...i am not sure what this shampoo is suppose to do...sometimes i think it makes my hair flat..bs
customer_reviews.author: Betty Simon

customer_reviews.title: Really like this product
customer_reviews.text: Really like this product. I first bought it at a saloon where I used to have my hair done and it's perfect for my grey wirery hair. It stays smooth and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great but expensive
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff, it makes my hair smooth and smells really good, but it is really expensive!
customer_reviews.author: maichelle

customer_reviews.title: Top Rated Hair Products.
customer_reviews.text: This is a sough after product that is rarely discounted. The discount is fair on the purchase price and i am happy to have it delivered as it saves time and gas.
customer_reviews.author: La Donna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These products were recommended by my hair stylist. They are great
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Great shampoo and conditioner
customer_reviews.text: Great shampoo and conditioner, but I hate smelling like a girl. Before you judge me, it was recommended, my hair was a disaster after moving, so there.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

product_meta.title: Bumble and Bumble Hairdresser's Invisible Oil Sulfate Free Shampoo & Conditioner
product_meta.description: Bumble and Bumble Hairdresser's Invisible Oil Sulfate Free Shampoo 8.5 oz & Conditioner 6.7 oz A multitasking sulfate-free shampoo for an immediate touchable transformation., A multitasking conditioner for an immediate touchable transformation
